name: BF3 Infobox
author: Calaelen

sections.description:
• 2013 Update
  • display your Battlefield 3 Player Statistics from bf3stats.com
  • Insert additional widgets for other players or accounts
  • Show/hide values via the settings (e.g. hide Origin username)
  • More features will be added in the future, e.g. a short Buddie List, last earned medal

Support

For support and latest dev builds visit the GitHub Page:
BF3 Infobox at GitHub

There will be no support within this WordPress page/forum. Please use the issue tracker at GitHub!

Attribution

BF3 statistics are provided by bf3stats.com

API Infos: bf3stats.com/api

Images by bf3stats.com and Dice/EA.

Licence

GPLv2 or later, please read the license.txt for more informations.
sections.installation:
1. Unpack the download-package
  2. Upload all files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Add a widget to your site via the design –> widget admin
  5. Use the Settings -> Battlefield 3 Info Options Page to show/hide values
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • CSS fix for widget table and rank symbol display

1.0

  • First submission to WordPress Plugin Repro
